title: MD
biography: Camilla Stoltenberg is a Norwegian physician and researcher. Since 13 August 2012, she has been Director-General of the Norwegian Institute of Public Health. She is the sister of former Prime Minister of Norway and General Secretary of NATO, Jens Stoltenberg.
aiSummary: Camilla Stoltenberg is a public health specialist with an H-index of 60 at Norwegian Institute of Public Health (Member). Has been published in JAMA, Nature Genetics, New England Journal of Medicine. Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
